special_text:
When Eteres enters, search your library for any number of cards with total mana value 3 or less, exile them with study counters on them, then shuffle.
[+2]: Put a land card you own in exile with a study counter on it onto the battlefield under your control. It gains “{T}: Add one mana of any type.”
[-1]: Exchange a card in your hand and a card you own in exile with a study counter on it.
[-3]: Exile target creature you control and put a study counter on it, then create two tokens that are copies of that creature.
